task: Confirm/update personal & family info with HR (name, DOB, marital status, dependants).
Register in MSS & create/update UNJSPF account (https://www.unjspf.org/resources/about-member-self-service/).
Submit documents electronically & update beneficiaries as needed.
Ensure PF4/SEP and SEPPA are issued by HR.
Confirm final payroll account or submit P.250 for alternate.
Track benefit status in MSS and check email for requests.
Close or update official accounts and subscriptions.
Return organization property (ID, equipment) and clear outstanding items.
Keep personal contact details current with UNJSPF.
